title: Listener Stories: Vol. 73
description:
Happy two days after our Atlanta costume contest live show (we mean November)! Christine has her celebratory headband on today and Em's costume hasn't even been mailed to them as we record this but we're just happy to be back reading your spooky stories. This month we've got trucker, road trip and vehicle related stories that give us quite the goosecam. And all of a sudden Em might have to learn how to cook a turkey... stay tuned to find out how that goes! And that's why we drink!

Don't miss our very last few Here for the Boos live shows! andthatswhywedrink.com/live
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Em Schulz, Christine Schiefer, Eva Gross)
